    • newReservation

      public static void newReservation​(String customerPhoneNumber, Calendar reservationDate, String customerName, int noOfPax, int tableNumber)
      public static void : newReservation Function to make a new Reservation with the given Customer's Phone number, the Reservation's date, customer's name, number of pax and the table's number
      Parameters:
      customerPhoneNumber - (String) Customer's phone number to make reservation under
      reservationDate - (Calendar) Date to make the new reservation for
      customerName - (String) Customer's name to make reservation under
      noOfPax - (int) number of pax under the reservation
      tableNumber - (int) Number of the table being used to make reservation for

    • checkCustomerReservation

      public static Reservation checkCustomerReservation​(String phoneNumber)
      public static Reservation : checkCustomerReservation Function to return Reservation if a reservation for the given phone number exists
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - (String) phoneNumber of the Customer to check reservation under
      Returns:
      Reservation if reservation exists for the given customer's phone number else return null.

    • checkTableReservation

      public static ArrayList<Reservation> checkTableReservation​(int tableNumber)
      public static ArrayList : checkTableReservation Function to return the reservation list for a given table number
      Parameters:
      tableNumber - (int) Number of the table to return reservation list for
      Returns:
      ArrayList list of reservations for the given tableNumber or return null if an invalid table number is passed

    • removeReservation

      public static void removeReservation​(String phoneNumber)
      public static void : removeReservation Function to remove a reservation for the given Customer's phone number
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - (String) Customer's phone number

    • getAvailableTables

      public static ArrayList<Table> getAvailableTables​(int noOfPax, Calendar time)
      public static ArrayList : getAvailableTables Function to return the list of available tables for a given number of pax and time
      Parameters:
      noOfPax - (int) number of pax required to check for in a table
      time - (Calendar) Time to check for table availability
      Returns:
      ArrayList list of available tables according to the given number of pax and time

    • removeExpiredReservation

      public static void removeExpiredReservation()
      public static void : removeExpiredReservation Function to remove an expired reservation if there is a reservation made and the Table is not occcupied after 15 minutes of the booking time
